title: Agent Context
description: Contextual information describing the circumstances under which an agent request is made.

request_id.description: Client-generated unique identifier for this agent request, used for idempotency and audit replay.

timestamp.description: ISO 8601 timestamp indicating when the request was created by the agent.

execution_mode.description: Indicates whether the request is informational, simulated, or intended to cause side effects.

locale.description: Optional locale preference (e.g. en-US) used for formatting responses.

currency.description: Optional ISO 4217 currency code preferred for monetary values.

user_agent.description: Optional human-readable description of the agent runtime environment.

constraints.description: Optional execution constraints provided by the caller.

max_amount.description: Maximum monetary amount the agent is permitted to consider.

expires_at.description: Optional expiration time after which the request must not be executed.

metadata.description: Optional contextual metadata. Informational only; not used for authorization decisions.
